cause.description:
Jubilee Scotland is supporting the international anti-debt movement in it's call for the cancellation of all illegitimate debt.
This is the debt which results from loans to dictators, oppressive interest rates, environmental abuses and harsh conditionalities.
To learn more and take action, follow this link to www.illegitimatedebt.org
1. Much of the UK's lending to poor countries has been unethical.
2. We want the UK government to cancel this illegitimate debt.
cause.name: Lift the Lid on Bad Loans
